template.description: Terrain UI data for Anvil's campaign map.

string.name: cursor_name
string.description: The cursor representing this terrain. Only the name of the RDO is required. Current expected directory of RDOs is in art/cursor/campaign/terrain.

enum.name: movement_node_terrain_type
enum.description: The terrain type for which these UI data belong to. Should be unique.

file.name: decorator_icon
file.description: The decorator icon that represents this terrain type, shown above a unit in-game.

string.name: name_internal
string.description: The internal name of the terrain. Not localized, but for identifying a terrain for internal use.

file.name: combat_preview_icon
file.description: The icon shown on the combat preview.

locstring.name: name_localized
locstring.description: The localized name of this terrain. Intended for showing the name of the terrain on the HUD.

file.name: terrain_image
file.description: ie the right part of terrain playercard (the big image.)
